Subject: Ultimo's last stand.....
Message-ID: <3B5625F5.816.F558BD@localhost>
Priority: normal
X-mailer: Pegasus Mail for Win32 (v3.12c)
From: gunthers@...

Ultimo Campeon looked at Hellpeon with hatred.  Nothing was 
workign against this bot.  But if he wanted only to weaken Ultimo, 
then Ultimo Campeon would weaken him, until death.  He fired 25 
shots at Hellpeon. "Your energy can't stop everything, you must 
have a limit" he cried out.
